mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASK ( NO, ORDERER, DEPT_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, IMPORTANCE ) VALUES ( SEQ_TASK_NO.NEXTVAL, #{orderer}, #{deptNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{importance} )
mapper.select: SELECT E.NAME, P.NAME AS POS_NO, D.NAME AS DEPT_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE RESIGN_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASK_ATT ( NO, EMP_NO, TASK_NO, TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_TASK_ATT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, SEQ_TASK_NO.CURRVAL, #{type} )
INSERT INTO TASK_FILE ( NO, TASK_NO, NAME, PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_TASK_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_TASK_NO.CURRVAL, #{name}, #{path} )
mapper.select: SELECT T.NO, E.NAME AS ORDERER, A.ATT_NAME, T.DEPT_NO, T.TITLE, T.CONTENT, T.ENROLL_DATE, T.START_DATE, T.END_DATE, T.IMPORTANCE FROM TASK T JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON T.ORDERER = E.NO JOIN ( SELECT A.TASK_NO, LISTAGG(E.NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.NAME) AS ATT_NAME FROM TASK_ATT A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_NO = E.NO WHERE A.TYPE = 'A' GROUP BY A.TASK_NO ) A ON T.NO = A.TASK_NO ORDER BY T.NO DESC

SELECT T.NO, E.NAME AS ORDERER, D.NAME AS DEPT_NO, P.NAME AS POS_NAME, T.TITLE, T.CONTENT, T.ENROLL_DATE, T.START_DATE, T.END_DATE, T.IMPORTANCE FROM TASK T JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.NO = T.ORDERER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.NO = T.DEPT_NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = E.POS_NO WHERE T.NO = #{no}

SELECT A.TASK_NO, LISTAGG(CONCAT(CONCAT(E.NAME, ' '), P.NAME), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.NAME) AS EMP_NO, A.TYPE FROM TASK_ATT A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_NO = E.NO JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.NO WHERE TYPE = 'A' AND A.TASK_NO = #{no} GROUP BY A.TASK_NO, A.TYPE

SELECT A.TASK_NO, LISTAGG(CONCAT(CONCAT(E.NAME, ' '), P.NAME), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.NAME) AS EMP_NO, A.TYPE FROM TASK_ATT A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_NO = E.NO JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.NO WHERE TYPE = 'R' AND A.TASK_NO = #{no} GROUP BY A.TASK_NO, A.TYPE
SELECT NO, TASK_NO, NAME, PATH FROM TASK_FILE WHERE TASK_NO = #{no}
SELECT NO, TASK_NO, NAME, PATH FROM TASK_FILE WHERE NO = #{no}
SELECT T.NO AS NO, E.NAME AS ORDERER, T.TITLE FROM TASK T JOIN TASK_ATT A ON T.NO = A.TASK_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.NO = T.ORDERER WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{no} ORDER BY T.NO DESC
